meanings.definition: A series of mountains or hills in a line
meanings.sent1: The beautiful ranges stretched across the horizon.
meanings.sent2: We hiked through the ranges and enjoyed the stunning views.
meanings.sent3: The ranges looked like a giant sleeping dragon.
meanings.sent4: The sun set behind the ranges, painting the sky in hues of orange and pink.
meanings.sent5: The snow-capped ranges stood majestically against the blue sky.

meanings.definition: The area of variation between upper and lower limits
meanings.sent1: The price ranges of the products were clearly displayed.
meanings.sent2: Her test scores fell within the ranges of average performance.
meanings.sent3: The temperature ranges in this city are quite unpredictable.
meanings.sent4: The emotion on his face ranges from joy to sorrow in an instant.
meanings.sent5: The color ranges of the painting added depth and interest.

meanings.sent1: His mood ranges from excitement to disappointment.
meanings.sent2: The temperature ranges between hot and cold throughout the day.
meanings.sent3: Her singing voice ranges from soft whispers to powerful notes.
meanings.sent4: The flavors in the dish range from sweet to savory.
meanings.sent5: The difficulty of the puzzles ranges from easy to challenging.

meanings.definition: To move or extend in a particular direction
meanings.sent1: The river ranges through the forest, creating a peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: The road ranges from the city center to the outskirts.
meanings.sent3: His gaze ranges across the crowded room, searching for familiar faces.
meanings.sent4: Her voice ranges effortlessly from low to high notes.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the sunset range from golden to crimson.
